content.html: I saw this qt and it gave me a reality check “from a young age, dress code conditions young men to sexualise and objectify their female class mates while simultaneously teaching young girls that getting harassed is their fault cause their clothes justify it.”
content.value:
I saw this qt and it gave me a reality check

“from a young age, dress code conditions young men to sexualise and objectify their female class mates while simultaneously teaching young girls that getting harassed is their fault cause their clothes justify it.”
